name: Mrs. Featherbottom | G7 Brisk
bio: Ciao! I'm Mrs. Featherbottom | G7 Brisk. I enjoy picking on mice, tripping my owner, and being a nevernude. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their silk scarves and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. Purrhaps this is the beginning of a beautiful relationship.
